articles.description: About 25,000 people will receive a covid-19 vaccine at multiple drive-thru clinics throughout Western Pennsylvania in the coming week. Allegheny Health Network and UPMC, the region’s two largest health systems, announced partnerships Wednesday with the …
articles.content:

articles.title: Carnival Releases Update: Six Brands are Resuming Cruises - Cruise Hive
articles.description: Carnival has released a major update on bookings and the resumption of operations across its cruise brands.
articles.content:
Carnival Corporations released a major update on Wednesday morning that included news on nine vessels resuming cruises this summer, high bookings and a continued push on resuming operations.
